The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "EQE values", "broad response", "300 to 750 nm", and "optical absorption profile". These entities are mentioned as they are and should be presented in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

After reviewing the entities in the paragraph, I have determined that only "EQE values" and "optical absorption profile" clearly refer to material properties. The other entities, "broad response" and "300 to 750 nm", are not specific enough to be considered material properties. Therefore, I have removed these entities from the list and present the remaining valid entities in the table above.

Paragraph: The EQE values are about 45% with a broad response from 300 to 750 nm , which are consistent with the optical absorption profile in Figure 1b.

Note: I have removed the phrase "The EQE values are" and "which are consistent with the optical absorption profile in Figure 1b" as they do not refer to specific values of material properties. The remaining values are 45% and 300 to 750 nm, which refer to the External Quantum Efficiency (EQE) and the broad response range, respectively.
